system.type: Influence 75, Consent of Existing Inquisitors, True Mighty Deeds, Express GM Permission.
system.descriptor: Inquisitors are utterly unique amongst the Imperium. They posses absolute, unending, near unquestionable authority sourced directly from sourced the Emperor of Mankind. At their word worlds burn, armies move, and all doors open.
system.uses:
Immediately gain Peer (Inquisition) talent, Forbidden Lore (Any One), and Leadership Aptitude. Gain access to a set of Inquisitor Elite Advances.
Gain the absolute authority of an Inquisitor, likely clearly affecting the narrative of the campaign.

description.value: Inquisitors are utterly unique amongst the Imperium. They posses absolute, unending, near unquestionable authority sourced directly from sourced the Emperor of Mankind. At their word worlds burn, armies move, and all doors open.
